occurrenceSearch.title: Occurrence search
occurrenceSearch.description: Search for occurrences in Global Biodiversity Information Facility. Free and Open Access to Biodiversity Data.
occurrenceSearch.failedSearch: Your filters might be invalid or the servers having issues. Please try again and report the issue if it continues
occurrenceSearch.imageLicenseInfo: Be aware that licences applied to images may differ from those applied to occurrence records
occurrenceSearch.combinedMediaTypeInfo: Note that the 'Media type' filter for video or audio does not work while in gallery view
occurrenceSearch.containsSuspicious: This map contains occurrences flagged by GBIF as having suspicious coordinates.
occurrenceSearch.errorUserThrottled: Your access has been temporarily restricted.
occurrenceSearch.polygonSimplifiedToFewerDecimals: The polygon has been simplified: number of decimals reduced
occurrenceSearch.polygonSimplifiedToFewerPoints: The polygon has been simplified: number of points reduced
occurrenceSearch.simplificationCausedSelfIntersection: Looks like the simplification caused the geometry to self-intersect. You should correct this before continuing.
occurrenceSearch.largeQueryLengthWarning: The URL of your query exceeds 2,000 characters and may not work properly in all browsers. For large and/or complicated queries, please consider using the download API.
occurrenceSearch.didYouMean: Your search matches a {RANK}: '{NAME}'. Do you wish to limit your search to this taxon only?
occurrenceSearch.clickToUseAcceptedTaxon: Click to search by the accepted name of the taxon. You will likely see more data as this includes data for all synonym usages.
